title: Sound loss during game play
body:
My sound has dropped to a barely audible level during any game play.   Login, queue, champ select all fine.  On my  PBE account game play sound is fine.  This began a couple of days ago, seemingly right after registering my pbe account and playing on it for the first time.  

I have uninstalled and reinstalled regular league, made sure other apps not running, and checked setting both in game and on computer.

Any thoughts?  This is very frustrating.... Thanks!

replies.body:
Try running a quick config reset with the steps I'll list below! Sometimes your settings get a little wonky server side, and no matter how you adjust them they will keep reverting to the server saved settings. If this doesn't help, there's also a really weird bug our techs have been tracking, and they requested a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some game logs if the reset doesn't help!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
